p:
At the end of December 2019, the first clusters of patients with pneumonia caused by SARS-CoV-2 were reported in Wuhan, China.
27 The basic reproduction number of SARS-CoV-2 is approximately 2.2, indicating that each patient would on average spread the infection to 2.2 people.
28 Human-to-human transmission of SARS-CoV-2 occurred rapidly, and the atypical symptoms during the early stage may be a further disadvantage.
29 Moreover, human infection might have begun months prior to the official announcement of the outbreak.
30
